Html:
Hi Guys, i have a problem that i can't figure out. How do i make element that can have 2 collections?
I would like to have the following XML in the configuration
<access>
<allow network="" />
<allow network="" />
<allow network="" />
<deny network="" />
<deny network="" />

</access>

Currently i have made "access" configuration section with two elements "allow" and "deny", which are respectively of type "allowCollection" and "denyCollection", but it seems that the generated schema asks me to structure the XML  that way:

<access>
<allow>
<allow network="" />
<allow network="" />
</allow>
<deny>
<deny network="" />
<deny network="" />
</deny>
</access>

 

Any ideas?
